short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Steam Sales Data With Napkin Maths

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension estimates the numbers of Owners, Wishlists, Gross Revenue, Net Revenue, and Average Playtime based on the Steam Store page data.

To use it, you need to be on the store page of the game and click on the extension to show the popup.

You can also change the parameters to get a closer estimation depending on what you want as a result.
